name: Pizza With Arugula, Corn And Bacon
recipeYield: 1 large, 2 medium, or more smaller pizzas
keywords: arugula, corn on the cob, pizza dough, main course
recipeIngredient: 6 cups loosely packed arugula, measured after washing, drying and shredding

recipeInstructions.text: Top prepared pizza rounds with arugula, corn and bacon. Bake about 15 minutes, or until nicely browned.
